messages.subject: religion and politics - tea parties and dinners
messages.msgSnippet: **-=-I was always told never to discuss religion or politics....... I believe those were very wise words.-=- That advice applies to tea parties and dinners.
messages.messageBody:
**-=-I was always told never to discuss religion or politics.......

I believe those were very wise words.-=-



That advice applies to tea parties and dinners.

Tea parties and dinners aren't intended to be educational! ;-)***




Good point, whoever said that!!



~Nicoletta
*********************************************************
"It is paradoxical, yet true: Children are the most in
need of loving attention when they act the least
deserving of it!"
by Aletha Solter, 1998
from the article "Why Children Misbehave"
